name: Iceman Zek Archives
description:
WELCOME TO THE ARCHIVES!

This is where I put my side projects, unfinished and finished bits of game that I didn't want to give a 'full' release. Enjoy this premium collection of oddities from your fourth favourite game developer.

ALSO! I GOT SHIRTS! HOODIES! STICKERS! HOT DAMN! You can get yours here:  https://teespring.com/stores/iceman-zek-official

(Anything I make from them goes directly into funding for assets for my upcoming projects!)

I've also made a Discord server for updates regarding my games, or for just hangin out. Join here: https://discord.gg/3UzXDb5m 

-

CREDITS! (aka copyright free material that I've used but would like to thank!)
